pageContent: Objectives: Efficacy evaluation of high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) treatment for localized prostate cancer and identification of the factors affecting the outcome.

metaData.source:
Significance of suspicious lesions at transrectal ultrasonography in men with serum prostate-specific antigen levels of < 20 ng/ml
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/17557565/
